about_the_game:
[Content included with this product]
- Season Pass 2

Note: The "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV" game software is required separately.

[Season Pass 2 Content]
- 1st Wave of DLC (December 10th)
Scenario "The Wavering Han Dynasty" & Event Set
- 2nd Wave of DLC (slated for January)
Editor - 4th Wave
Scenario for War Chronicles Mode - 1st Wave
- 3rd Wave of DLC (slated for February)
Additional Scenario & Event Set
Scenario for War Chronicles Mode - 2nd Wave
RTK12 Officer CG Set
- 4th Wave of DLC (slated for March)
Scenarios for War Chronicles Mode - 3rd Wave
5 Additional Events
Watercolor Painting Style Officer CG Set (Wei, Wu, Shu)
- 5th Wave of DLC (slated for April)
Additional Scenarios & Events Set
Scenarios for War Chronicles Mode - 4th Wave
5 Additional Events
RTK13 Officer CG Set
- 6th Wave of DLC (slated for May)
Scenario for War Chronicles Mode - 5th Wave
5 Additional Events

Note: Contents of the Season Pass are available as individual DLC releases. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
Note: To play the scenarios for War Chronicles Mode, the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV" game software and the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack" are both required.
detailed_description:
[Content included with this product]
- Season Pass 2

Note: The "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV" game software is required separately.

[Season Pass 2 Content]
- 1st Wave of DLC (December 10th)
Scenario "The Wavering Han Dynasty" & Event Set
- 2nd Wave of DLC (slated for January)
Editor - 4th Wave
Scenario for War Chronicles Mode - 1st Wave
- 3rd Wave of DLC (slated for February)
Additional Scenario & Event Set
Scenario for War Chronicles Mode - 2nd Wave
RTK12 Officer CG Set
- 4th Wave of DLC (slated for March)
Scenarios for War Chronicles Mode - 3rd Wave
5 Additional Events
Watercolor Painting Style Officer CG Set (Wei, Wu, Shu)
- 5th Wave of DLC (slated for April)
Additional Scenarios & Events Set
Scenarios for War Chronicles Mode - 4th Wave
5 Additional Events
RTK13 Officer CG Set
- 6th Wave of DLC (slated for May)
Scenario for War Chronicles Mode - 5th Wave
5 Additional Events

Note: Contents of the Season Pass are available as individual DLC releases. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
Note: To play the scenarios for War Chronicles Mode, the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV" game software and the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack" are both required.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 (3.0GHz or over)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: 1280 x 720 Display required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 (3.0GHz or over)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit 5.1ch Surround, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: 1920 x 1080 Display recommended

oflc.descriptors: Mild themes, Violence and coarse language
